turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which Starbucks would you like to pickup your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Maplewood, New Jersey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that on maple would have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say maplewood avenue new jersey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Its on Maplewood Ave in Maplewood, New Jersey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cafe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I please have a Bentley?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do not want whipped cream, but I do want to add flavored syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of syrup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sugar-free vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your order: venti latte with soy milk and sugar free vanilla syrup is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your coffee will be ready for pickup at the Starbucks in Maplewood ave in Maplewood New jersey in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much, I appreciate your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you through text message. enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks, byebye.
